mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT F_ID, BOARD_ID FROM FAVORITE WHERE U_ID = #{uId}) F JOIN (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE POST_TYPE_ID = 4) B ON (F.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON (B.EVENT_ID = E.EVENT_ID)

SELECT F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT F.F_ID, F.U_ID, F.BOARD_ID, E.EVENT_ID, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT F_ID, BOARD_ID, U_ID FROM FAVORITE WHERE U_ID = #{uId}) F JOIN (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE POST_TYPE_ID = 4) B ON (F.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON (B.EVENT_ID = E.EVENT_ID) )) WHERE seq >= #{start} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}

SELECT F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, A_ID, A_ADDR, A_NAME, A_THUMBNAIL_IMG, A_ONE_LINER FROM (SELECT seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, A_ID, A_ADDR, A_NAME, A_THUMBNAIL_IMG, A_ONE_LINER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, A_ID, A_ADDR, A_NAME, A_THUMBNAIL_IMG, A_ONE_LINER FROM (SELECT F.F_ID, F.U_ID, F.BOARD_ID, A.A_ID, A.A_ADDR, A.A_NAME, A.A_THUMBNAIL_IMG, A.A_ONE_LINER FROM (SELECT F_ID, BOARD_ID, U_ID FROM FAVORITE WHERE U_ID = #{uId}) F JOIN (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE POST_TYPE_ID = 1) B ON (F.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) LEFT JOIN ACTIVITY_INFO A ON (B.BOARD_ID = A.A_ID))) WHERE seq >= #{start}) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}

SELECT F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT F.F_ID, F.U_ID, F.BOARD_ID, E.EVENT_ID, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT F_ID, BOARD_ID, U_ID FROM FAVORITE WHERE U_ID = #{uId}) F JOIN (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE POST_TYPE_ID = 4) B ON (F.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON (B.EVENT_ID = E.EVENT_ID) )) WHERE seq >= #{start} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}

SELECT F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, F_ID, U_ID, BOARD_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT F.F_ID, F.U_ID, F.BOARD_ID, E.EVENT_ID, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT F_ID, BOARD_ID, U_ID FROM FAVORITE WHERE U_ID = #{uId}) F JOIN (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE POST_TYPE_ID = 4) B ON (F.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON (B.EVENT_ID = E.EVENT_ID))) WHERE seq >= #{start}) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}
